mutants.code:
def find_max_average_subarray(arr, n, k):
    st = 1
    ed = k - 1
    cur_sum = sum(arr[0:k])
    max_sum = cur_sum
    for i in range(k, n):
        cur_sum += arr[i] - arr[i - k]
        if cur_sum > max_sum:
            max_sum = cur_sum
            st = i - k + 1
            ed = i
    return arr[st:ed + 1]

    st = -1

            max_sum = cur_sum
            st = i - k + 1
            ed = i
    return arr[st:ed + 1]
